questions.question: 24. The distance between Place A and Place B is 720 kilometres. A car has travelled 240 kilometres in three hours. At this speed, in how many hours will it reach Place B?

questions.chapter_title: 2025 The First Semester G4 Final Test > IV.Solve the problems (21’)
questions.question: 26. A store received a delivery of 1125 kg of pineapples. After 20 baskets of pineapples were sold, there were 185 kg of pineapples remaining. If each basket came with the same weight, how many kilograms did each basket weigh?
